summary: My Attempt at making a semi high definition retex of the wolf armor.
descriptionHtml:
My Attempt at making a semi high definition retex of the wolf armor. I love the Wolf armor and my goal for this retex was to make it a dark more sinister looking armor that stood out but wasnt too flashy, this does not create new armor it only replaces the appearance of Wolf Armor 

This is my first mod any feed back or suggestions are appreciated 

Changes from the Original.
=============================================
The resolution has been increase
The armor color has been changed from silver to black
The fur color has been changed to deeper colors
The arms and legs are now black chainmail
The gauntlets engraving has been designed on the pauldrons and shin guards
Then armors abdominal area has more scales

Changes from the 1.0
=============================================
Female Version Added
Upped the quality detail of the armors abs
Made the Straps on the Gauntlets Black
Made the helmet Pattern closer less saturated to match cuirass

Installation
=============================================
Extract the Zip to ur data folder (C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data) usually should be this address, to receive in game you can buy wolf armor from Eorlund Gray-Mane after joining the companions
author: Heidenreich
